title: Step count log
description: Each entry records number of steps taken in a given time interval.

start_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date identifying start of interval.

start_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time identifying start of interval.

end_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date identifying end of interval.

end_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time identifying end of interval.

start_location_id.description: location where the meal took place.
